ygData.subject: Introduction to Berserk...
ygData.msgSnippet: Eerie stopped in her tracks. There it goes again. she mused to herself aloud. She listened to her scanner. What? her comm-link asked from one of her bounty

Subject: Introduction to Berserk...
Message-ID: <8rfp5i+7ckq@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 2497
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: wilddance_mare@...

Eerie stopped in her tracks. "There it goes again." she mused to 
herself aloud. She listened to her scanner.

"What?" her comm-link asked from one of her bounty hunter group.

"My Berserk scanner," she replied, noticing that he heard her. "It's 
goin' off again."

"You haven't deleted that program yet?" her comm-link asked. 

"No," she replied. "It went off on the nothern side of th' vector. 
Somethin's goin' on. I'm gonna find out!" She turned her track, 
following her scanner.

"Eerie, whoa!" her comm called to her. "Wait!"

She shut it off and went on. Her feet clashed against the ground, 
running faster as she came closer. She turned to a more populated 
area where a lot of business was done. She came here on occassions.

She kept a close eye out, watching everything that she ran past, 
looking for the familiar build of the clone Berserk. She went down to 
a open area. That's when she saw him. She skidded to a stop, her 
mouth and eyes wide. She gasped in surprise to see that he was fully 
repaired.

"You!"

Berserk jerked his head and snarled instantly at her. "Eerie." 

She frowned at him. "You know me all right."

"Berserk, no!" a female by him shouted and grabbed his arm. What was 
she doing trying to stop that freak. If there was going to be a fight 
between them, there would be a fight. Just like last time. She was 
going to win. 

"Get out of th' way ya idiot!" she shouted to him. She withdrew a gun 
from behind her armor and aimed him.

"No!" the female shouted. She dropped a large rifle that was in her 
arms and jumped in front of Berserk. "Don't fire!"

"Get th' Pit outta th' way!" She fired at Berserk. The shot hit his 
shoulder, jerking his chest back. She snarled and bared his teeth. 

"Berserk!" Berserk charged past the female. She wouldn't have the 
chance to grab him. He'd plow right through her. Eerie braced herself 
as Berserk charged at her, with his black clawed hands out. She 
ducked to the side. She kicked up at him, but he grabbed her ankle 
and lifted her up in the air. She threw her. 

Eerie sat up, looking at Berserk. Two bots jumped on him, the same 
female and a red colored male.

"Berserk, power down!" the male commanded. Eerie got back up and ran 
at them. She leaped up and kicked Berserk on the jaw. Berserk stepped 
back. The bot bots fell off of him.  Berserk kicked Eerie to the 
ground. She landed on her chest, taking a moment to reach back and 
grab a dagger from behind her armor. She jumped up and slashed at him.
